scripts.build: npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/core' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/layout-core' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/layout-circlepack' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/layout-circular' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/layout-force' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/layout-forceatlas2' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/layout-noverlap' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/layout-random' && npm run build --workspace='@react-sigma/examples'
scripts.start: concurrently -n core,layout-core,layout-circlepack,layout-circular,layout-force,layout-forceatlas2,layout-noverlap,layout-random,examples 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/core' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-core' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-circlepack' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-circular' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-force' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-forceatlas2' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-noverlap' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-random' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/examples'
